TopicTitle: Solid booster only rocket as tall as the VAB. (Stock)

Articles.Content:
I decided to try and make the tallest rocket I could using only solid boosters. In the end, I got it as tall as the VAB, and it weighed in at a whopping 304.4 tons. After letting it settle on the pad for a minute, I launched this behemoth and got it into a rather eccentric orbit with a PeK of 90KM and ApK of over 1MM.

I also made a light version by stripping off the bottom most two stages. This not quit so tall rocket weighs in at 206.1 tons, and it can make it into LKO.

Enjoy!
As tall? That looks much bigger than the vab
the vab is where u make rockets. don\'t mix it up with the launch pad
Now to build the rocket that gets the Kerbals to the command capsule! =P
